## Bayesian capture-recapture analysis with HMMs

+ Bags of tricks for HMM, and Nimble
+ Think of OBS and STATES first. And the observation and transition matrices.
+ Start simple, all parameters constant for example. 
+ Use simulations!!
+ Do not try to optimize your code. Make it work first. Then think of optimization.
+ Workflow by Gelman et al. 
+ Sensitivity analyses.
